flawed_nl_solution:
There are a total of 11 + 1 = <<11+1=12>>12 boys in the class.
Hence, there are a total of 12 boys + 13 girls = <<12+13=25>>25 students in a class.
So 13/25 x 100% = <<13/25 x 100% = 25>>25% of the class are girls.
#### 25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 52, not 25. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
